content:
TITLE: Creating a Dash App with DatePickerInput Component
DESCRIPTION: A complete example showing how to create a Dash application with a DatePickerInput component from dash-mantine-components. The example includes setting up the app, creating a layout with the DatePickerInput, and implementing a callback to update text based on the selected date.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from datetime import date

import dash
from dash import Dash, Input, Output, callback, html
from dash.exceptions import PreventUpdate

import dash_mantine_components as dmc

dash._dash_renderer._set_react_version('18.2.0')

app = Dash(__name__, external_stylesheets=dmc.styles.ALL)

app.layout = dmc.MantineProvider(
    [
        dmc.DatePickerInput(
            id="date-picker",
            label="Start Date",
            description="You can also provide a description",
            minDate=date(2020, 8, 5),
            value=None,
            w=200
        ),
        dmc.Space(h=10),
        dmc.Text(id="selected-date"),
    ]
)


@callback(Output("selected-date", "children"), Input("date-picker", "value"))
def update_output(d):
    prefix = "You have selected: "
    if d:
        return prefix + d
    else:
        raise PreventUpdate


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app.run_server(debug=True)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dash Mantine Components with pip
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the dash-mantine-components package using pip package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install dash-mantine-components
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Dependencies for Dash Mantine Components
DESCRIPTION: Lists the core dependencies required for using Dash Mantine Components. This includes the base Dash framework and the dash_mantine_components package itself, which provides Mantine UI components for Dash applications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/PRs/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
dash
dash_mantine_components
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Dash Framework Dependency
DESCRIPTION: Defines the minimum required version of Dash framework as version 2.0 or higher using pip dependency syntax.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/requires-install.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
dash>=2
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Components for Dash Mantine Components
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to build the components for Python, R, and Julia in the Dash Mantine Components project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests for Dash Mantine Components using Pytest
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to run all tests or specific tests using pytest for the Dash Mantine Components project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pytest

# Or, use -k to run tests that match part of a test case name
pytest -k <test_case_name>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing JavaScript Dependencies for Dash Mantine Components
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install the necessary JavaScript dependencies for building components in the Dash Mantine Components project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Python Dependencies for Dash Mantine Components
DESCRIPTION: This requirements file specifies all dependencies needed for developing and testing the dash-mantine-components package. It includes specific version constraints for compatibility, such as requiring dash with ci, dev, and testing extras, pytest before version 8.1.0, and selenium before version 4.3.0.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/requires-dev.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
dash[ci,dev,testing]>=2
pyyaml>=5.0
pytest<8.1.0
wheel
selenium<4.3.0
black
build
dash-iconify
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning and Configuring Repository for Dash Mantine Components in Bash
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to clone a forked repository of Dash Mantine Components and set up the upstream remote for contribution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Clone your fork of the repo into the current directory
git clone https://github.com/<your-username>/dash-mantine-components.git

# Navigate to the newly cloned directory
cd dash-mantine-components

# Assign the original repo to a remote called "upstream"
git remote add upstream https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Dependencies for Dash Mantine Components Development
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet lists the primary dependencies required for developing dash-mantine-components. It includes dash[dev] for the development environment, wheel for package distribution, build for packaging Python projects, and black for code formatting.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
dash[dev]>=2.5.1
wheel
build
black
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Python Development Dependencies for Dash Mantine Components
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to install the necessary Python packages for development of Dash Mantine Components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install -r requires-dev.txt
pip install -e .
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Virtual Environment for Dash Mantine Components in Bash
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to create and activate a Python virtual environment for the Dash Mantine Components project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/snehilvj/dash-mantine-components/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
```
